name: Rising Tide (Pere)
description:
Made in about 3 weeks for Ludum Dare 50.

Escape the rising tide as you try to balance your survival with gathering resources to make a raft.

Made  in C++ with no external libraries or engines. The game has no audio because I didn't have time for that.

Here's the source code: https://github.com/Pere001/rising_tide_ld50
